description:
Qualifications

  • Demonstrated ability to provide customer service in a courteous, professional manner, consistently a positive image for the department.
  • Skills in tactful oral communication in person or by phone, to provide information regarding program procedures policies ability to direct complaints or explain program procedures policies first before passing on to incumbent supervisor.
  • Skills in performing with frequent interruptions and distractions.
  • Demonstrated verbal and written communication skills in English, particularly in speaking clearly and distinctly, using appropriate vocabulary and grammar to convey and obtain information to from individuals at various organizational levels skill in making sound decisions in the absence of detailed instructions or supervision.
  • Skills in working independently and following through on assignment with minimal or no supervision. Skill in prioritizing assignments to complete work in a timely manner.
